display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: Apneas with >=3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >=3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + carbp3 + carop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oarbp3 + oarop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3 ) / slpprdp
